snippet.title: What Lies in the Multiverse | Announce Trailer (PC, PS4, XB1, Switch)
snippet.description:
Wishlist now at https://play-multiverse.com/

Welcome to What Lies in the Multiverse – a dimension-shifting, comedic adventure about worlds turned inside out through the powers of one gifted young boy and the misguided lessons of an eccentric scientist.

Coming in early 2022 to PC, PS4, XB1 and Switch.

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1721170/What_Lies_in_the_Multiverse/

To keep up with Untold Tales and Multiverse use the following links: 

Website: https://untoldtales.games/ 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/untoldtalesgames 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/untoldtalesHQ
Discord: https://discord.gg/vy8A33V533
